```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
top <- read_csv("billboard.csv") |>
  select(date = "Date",
         song = "Song",
         artist = "Artist")
head(top)
```

```{r}
modern <- top |>
  filter(date >= "1980-01-01")
head(modern)
```

```{r}
artists <- modern |>
  count(artist) |>
  arrange(-n) |>
  filter(! artist %in% c("Soundtrack", "Various Artists"))
head(artists)
```

```{r}
set.seed(37)
xs <- sample(1:100, 25)
xs
```

```{r}
me <- median(xs)
```

Median is `r me`.

```{r}
artists[xs,] |>
```
